title: S12 Ep76: The Specters of The Sorrell-Weed House
itunes:title: The Specters of The Sorrell-Weed House
description:
Some places go beyond the label of being a haunted house. Does the Sorrel-Weed House sit on tainted land, cursing those that have lived there? Tragedy after tragedy befell the inhabitants of this stately manor and tonight we learn its haunting history.

Nick Wood: https://sorrelweedhouse.com/

https://www.savannahstoryteller.com/
